name: C64 Bitmap Convertor and Fixer - V07
name_original: C64 Bitmap Convertor and Fixer - V07
description:
A tool for converting images or Backdrop designer based C64 images to C64-ready images. Still to do many things but though, I'll release it now for you all to try. =)

V07 - Added Dither filtering F1(none) / F2(Standard - Default) / F3 (Heavy) improved layout. Currently improving the clean-up algorithm for better results (for the next version).

V06 - Initial Release.
